timeline.message:
update to JDK 15 and TypeScript 4, update server and client dependencies

* client: prefer undefined over null: this simplifies code, because we only need to distinguish one case (only undefined and not null) in most cases. Also Typescript assumes undefined if nothing is specified anyway. Also it allows us to mark elements as not existing (old delete functionality) in case they should removed in the client.
* client: mark all domain object attributes as optional to reflect the case that those elements might not be available due to the automatic json conversion into anonymous Javascript objects during runtime. This is also important when we upload objects to the server, as non existing elements default to null and null should typically not be used in json payloads.
* server: add token-based authentication for Bamboo into yml files

Merge branch 'develop' into chore/update-deps-java15-ts4

(due to the typescript changes, additional branches in the code might have been introduced)

Fix for manual assessment via option key being undefined.
Bug happens when this.startIndex is 0, which converts to false in js.

The bug was that the === null check fails if studentParticipation is
undefined
Fix for error that lectures can not be created
changed delete to explicit setting to undefined
